#nametype [nametype]: 111

summoned with #371 Call Yata (Conjuration 6)

Once the Caelian peoples were under the rule of divine beings known as Yazatas and Daevas. When these lesser divinities threatened the world with their never-ending war, they were banished by the Pantokrator. The worship of the Yazatas remained, but the Daevas and their rulers were abandoned and all but forgotten. But some unscrupulous sorcerers try to circumvent the ban and summon the divinities of old to lead the nation to world dominance. The most powerful of the ancient Daevas are servants of the Daevic Heptad and the Destructive Spirit. The Daevas of Shooting Stars are bringers of misfortune and bad omens.
